data.title: Detroit Pistons Team News, Fixtures and Results
data.meta_description: Get the latest Detroit Pistons news, team updates, fixtures and results right here.
data.text:
Detroit Pistons FIRE head coach Monty Williams - despite still having $65MILLION left to pay him

The Detroit Pistons are reportedly parting ways with head coach Monty Williams, who still has a whopping five years and $65 million left on his contract.

Watch the moment Joel Embiid makes INCREDIBLE circus shot while falling as the 76ers beat the Pistons 120-102 to extend their win streak to six games

As he approached the arch, Embiid changed gears before bumping into Detroit's Jalen Duren and falling off balance. Rather than holding onto the ball or passing it, he blindly threw it over his head.

Father of Brooklyn Nets NBA star Dorian Finney-Smith watches his son play for the first time EVER... following his release from prison after serving 29 YEARS for second-degree murder

It may have been just Game 78 on the Brooklyn Nets' schedule, but it was something far more meaningful for forward Dorian Finney-Smith.

Pistons rookie Ausar Thompson to miss remainder of season with BLOOD CLOTS... but the 21-year-old NBA star should be ready for next season

Detroit Pistons rookie swingman Ausar Thompson will miss the rest of the season due to a blood clot, the team announced Wednesday. He is expected to recover in time for next year.

Isiah Thomas urges Michael Jordan to apologize on 'international TV' after calling him an 'a**hole' in 'The Last Dance': 'Now if you meant it, let it stand... I'm good with that'

While appearing on 'The Draymond Green Show', Thomas - a two-time NBA champion - was asked if his relationship with 'His Airness' is salvageable after Jordan's comments in the 2020 miniseries.

Detroit Pistons general manager Troy Weaver gets into furious argument with a fan in the stands and tells him 'you're lucky I don't beat your a**' - after being told he 'sucks at his job'

The Pistons are the joint-worst team in the NBA and lost their 53rd game of the season against the Dallas Mavericks - which was seemingly the tipping point for one unnamed fan in the stands.

Raiders DE Maxx Crosby defends his team's 'Michael Jordan rules' for taking on Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes: 'It's not malicious…we play the game the right way, but we play violent'

Las Vegas Raiders defensive end Maxx Crosby is backing his coach and the team's philosophy when it comes to playing against Kansas City Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes.

Detroit Pistons coach Monty Williams STORMS OUT of his postgame press conference after 113-110 defeat to the Knicks... as he accuses officials of making 'the absolute worst call of the season' in New York

'The absolute worst call of the season,' Williams said of the final sequence to open his presser. 'No call. And enough's enough. We've done it the right way, we've called the league, we've sent in clips.

Pistons forward Isaiah Stewart suspended three games after a fight with Phoenix Suns' Drew Eubanks... but assault charges against the Detroit star have been dropped

The NBA suspended Detroit Pistons forward-center Isaiah Stewart for three games without pay because of a February 14 altercation with Phoenix Suns center Drew Eubanks before a game.

Pistons star Isaiah Stewart is ARRESTED after 'punching Drew Eubanks in the FACE' before Detroit's game vs. Phoenix as Suns slam 'unprovoked, unacceptable' attack

A statement from Phoenix Police, per The Athletic, read: 'Stewart was arrested for assault and issued a citation and released. The investigation remains active.'

Pistons star Isaiah Stewart 'PUNCHED rival Drew Eubanks in the FACE' before Detroit's game vs. Suns with 'police forced to intervene' as Suns slam 'unprovoked, unacceptable' attack

The two players were said to have gone chest-to-chest before Stewart connected with a punch to Eubank's lip area. The pair exchanged words before Eubanks was 'suckerpunched'.

Former Detroit Pistons star Earl Cureton dies at 66 after collapsing at his Michigan home as tributes pour in for the NBA champion: 'He was always trying to inspire young people to chase their dreams'

After representing the city of Detroit at the high school, college, and professional levels, former Pistons star Earl Cureton passed away Sunday at age 66 at his home in Michigan.

Russell Westbrook: Clippers star becomes 25th player in NBA history to reach 25,000 points as he reaches milestone in win over the Pistons

Westbrook, who put up 23 points and nine assists for the Clippers in Detroit, joined teammate James Harden in the 25k club after the latter accomplished the feat back in December.

'Jared Goff' chants breakout at high school cheerleading event as fans show love for the Lions QB ahead of NFC Championship against 49ers

Ahead of Sunday's NFC Championship between the Detroit Lions and San Francisco 49ers, chants for quarterback Jared Goff have begun breaking out all around the state of Michigan.

Olivia Dunne leaves fans VERY impressed as LSU gymnast shows off her basketball skills on Instagram: 'Still better than Ben Simmons!'

The short montage showed the social media sensation attempting to dribble with both hands and put the ball through her legs. She also successfully converts a layup and three-point shot.

Marvin Bagley heading to the Wizards in blockbuster trade from Pistons, as Isaiah Livers joins him in Washington, with Danilo Gallinari and Mike Muscala going the other way to Detroit

As reported by ESPN on Sunday morning, Bagley, Livers and two second-round picks are heading to Washington, while the Pistons pick up Danilo Gallinari and Mike Muscala.

Victor Wembanyama will 'for sure' score 101 POINTS in a single game, claims former Lakers forward Metta Sandiford-Artest in bold prediction

Metta Sandiford-Artest, who was previously known as both Ron Artest and Metta World Peace, said this week that Victor Wembanyama will score 101 points in a game in the next several years.

Cavinder twins are gifted matching jerseys by the Rockets as they sit courtside for Houston's dominant win over the Pistons on New Year's Day

The social media-famous sisters were given the celebrity row treatment to ring in the New Year as they sat courtside for the Rockets' 136-113 win over the Detroit Pistons on Monday.

Pistons FINALLY win! After 28 straight losses - an NBA season record - Detroit beats the Toronto Raptors to secure first victory in 63 days and avoid the longest skid in league history

The Detroit Pistons have finally ended their losing streak, beating the Toronto Raptors to secure a first victory in 29 NBA matches after more than two months of waiting.

Detroit Pistons blow 21-point first half lead and lose to the Boston Celtics to tie the record for the NBA's longest ever losing streak at 28 games

The Detroit Pistons historic losing streak extended to 28-straight games and counting after they suffered a 128-122 overtime loss to the Boston Celtics.

Detroit Pistons set NBA single season record with 27-game losing streak after being defeated 118-112 by the Brooklyn Nets

The Detroit Pistons suffered a 118-112 loss to the Brooklyn Nets to move their losing streak to an NBA single season record 27 straight games.

Detroit fans turn on Pistons' owners as they chant 'sell the team' after blowing chance to end their 25-game losing streak against the Jazz... as they move to within one of tying unwanted NBA record

The Detroit Pistons have now lost their 25-straight game in a row following Thursday night's 119-111 defeat to the Utah Jazz.

Giannis Antetokounmpo brings his kids onto the bench during the Bucks' 146-114 blowout victory over the Pistons... which extended Detroit's record losing streak to 23 GAMES

With just over three minutes left in the game, Antetokounmpo sat his sons next to him on the bench to watch the Bucks breeze towards a 146-114 victory.

That's one word for it! Detroit Pistons coach Monty Williams laments 'deflating' run of losses - after woeful NBA strugglers recorded a franchise record 22ND STRAIGHT defeat against the Philadelphia 76ers

Joel Embiid scored 35 points and Tyrese Maxey added 19 as the Philadelphia 76ers became the latest team to thrash Detroit - taking their losing streak to a new franchise record.

Detroit's November nightmare! Awful Pistons lost EVERY game last month to set new franchise record of 16 consecutive defeats... with their last win coming on October 28

The struggling franchise lost all 15 of their games over the course of the last month - including Thursday night's 118-112 defeat by the Knicks.

Jordan Poole is left red-faced as the Wizards star has his shot swatted after stopping to stare down a defender in Washington win over Detroit Pistons

Wizards shooting guard Jordan Poole hilariously had his shot blocked after stopping to stare down a defender in the 126-107 win over the Detroit Pistons.

Giannis Antetokounmpo scores NBA season-high 54 points but Bucks LOSE 126-124 to the Pacers after Tyrese Haliburton sinks go-ahead 3-pointer late in the fourth quarter

The result ensured Antetokounmpo became only the fifth player in NBA history to score 50 or more points on 75% shooting in a loss.

Furious Giannis Antetokounmpo sits down on the front row with Bucks fans in protest at being ejected for taunting during Milwaukee's narrow win over the Pistons

Antetokounmpo got a second technical foul for taunting a Pistons defender after a towering dunk that put the Bucks up 73-60 with nine minutes left in the third quarter.

Pelicans reveal CJ McCollum has been diagnosed with a small collapsed right lung again... two years after suffering the same injury with the Trail Blazers

The Pelicans announced in a statement on Sunday that McCollum has been diagnosed with a 'small pneumothorax' in his right lung, meaning part of the lung has collapsed.

ESPN basketball icon Dick Vitale breaks his silence amid vocal cord cancer battle and shares emotional video with fans: 'I didn't speak for seven months'

Dick Vitale has regained his voice following his latest battle with vocal cord cancer, and now the 84-year-old college basketball announcer is already planning his return to the ESPN booth.

Brendan Malone dies at 81: Long-time NBA and NCAA coach, and the father of the Nuggets' Michael Malone, is remembered as a 'great man' who had a 'profound' impact on his pupils

Brendan Malone, the long-time NBA coach and father of Denver Nuggets coach Michael Malone, has died at 81. The Nuggets revealed the news Tuesday without specifying a cause of death.

Can Aaron Rodgers return from a torn Achilles at age 40? The Jets star, 39, is an unknown territory after fellow quarterbacks like Johnny Unitas and Dan Marino struggled to come back... but there are reasons for optimism

New York Jets quarterback Aaron Rodgers has vowed to 'rise again' after rupturing his Achilles tendon, but history is less optimistic - particularly when it comes to athletes in their 30s.

NBA star Bojan Bogdanovic marries his stunning partner Zrinka Sahuric in lavish ceremony in her hometown of Dubrovnik

The Detroit Pistons forward, 34, and his sunning bride exchanged their vows in front of friends and family at the Jesuit Church of St. Ignatius, in Zrinka's hometown of Dubrovnik.

Former NBA coach and analyst Stan Van Gundy's wife, Kimberly, dies suddenly at the age of 61

Stan Van Gundy coached the Heat, Magic, Pistons and Pelicans throughout his career in the NBA. He met Kimberly when he was the head coach of the men's basketball team at Castleton State College.

NBA Hall of Famer, who claims the league has gone 'soft', looks unrecognizable from his championship-winning playing days

During his 16-year career, Ben Wallace earned a reputation as one of the toughest players in the league after going undrafted following a four-year career in college.

The Detroit Pistons lock up Isaiah Stewart for four more years after 'agreeing to $64 million rookie contract extension'

Stewart's deal is the first rookie extension since team owner Tom Gores purchased the franchise back in 2011, and the organization's first in general since Jason Maxiell in 2008.

NBA SUMMER LEAGUE ROUNDUP: Victor Wembanyama bounces back in impressive second NBA Summer League game, while Houston's Jabari Smith drops consecutive 30-plus-point display against the Pistons

Following his mere nine-point display against the Charlotte Hornets last week, Wemby finished with 27 points and 12 rebounds in the Spurs' 85-80 loss against the Portland Trail Blazers.

NBA SUMMER LEAGUE ROUNDUP: Chet Holmgren continues strong return from foot surgery as he wows for the Thunder, while 2023 No. 5 pick Ausar Thompson makes his debut for the Pistons

Holmgren had been the No. 2 pick in the 2022 Draft but missed the entirety of what would have been his debut season after sustaining a Lisfranc injury in his right foot last summer.

Rockets rookie Amen Thompson 'to miss the remainder of NBA Summer League after ankle sprain rules him out for two-three weeks'

The 20-year-old, who will wear a boot, is reportedly now expected to miss two-three weeks, meaning he could be sidelined for the remainder for the Summer League, which finishes on July 17.

'It's like a bad divorce': Twins Amen and Ausar Thompson joke about splitting their belongings - including their PS5 - as they're selected back-to-back in the NBA Draft as the first brothers to be taken in the top 5

The Thompson twins are the first siblings ever taken in the top five when they were taken back to back. Amen was taken first, when the Rockets picked him . Then, Ausar was selected by the Pistons .

NBA Draft 2023 RECAP: Victor Wembanyama unsurprisingly goes as No 1 overall with Brandon Miller and Scoot Henderson second and third

Relive all the action from the 2023 NBA Draft with Mail Sport's live blog, as we found out to find out where the best young talent is headed on a huge night in Brooklyn...

Warriors 'really want' Draymond Green back, says new GM Mike Dunleavy Jr., but ESPN's Stephen A. Smith says 33-year-old will cost at least $100million as a free agent after opting out of deal

The Golden State Warriors want Draymond Green back but may have to pony up another $100 million in salary for the 33-year-old soon-to-be free agent, according to ESPN's Stephen A. Smith.

Monty Williams reveals his wife, Lisa, had breast cancer during Suns' playoff run and delayed accepting Pistons job until her condition improved

'The reason that I bring it up is to not talk about my family, but to make it more of an emphasis that women need early detection testing,' Williams said at his first Piston press conference.

Stephen Silas 'agrees to join the Detroit Pistons and Monty Williams as lead assistant coach following his spell as Houston Rockets head coach'

Back in April, Houston declined Silas' option for 2023-24, ending his three-year tenure with a 59-177 record. The 49-year-old has been a top assistant with Dallas, Charlotte and Golden State.

NBA icon Dennis Rodman lifts the lid on 'unreal' fling with Carmen Electra, how having sex with so many different women became a 'job' - and his THREE very gruesome bedroom injuries

Rodman won titles with the Detroit Pistons and Michael Jordan's Chicago Bulls, but made front-page news as well as back with his relentless partying and famous relationships.

Monty Williams and Detroit Pistons 'agree to the largest contract EVER given to an NBA head coach on six-year, $78.5MILLION terms - that could increase to eight years and $100M!'

The Detroit Pistons have agreed to the largest coaching deal in with Monty Williams worth $78.5 million over the course of six years, according to multiple sources.

The Detroit Pistons are 'heavily targeting' Monty Williams to be their new head coach and are 'prepared' to offer him $10M per season

What's unclear is if Williams is interested in coaching this season. Williams reportedly is owed $21M on the three remaining years of his contract with Phoenix.

Victor's headed to San Antonio! Wembanyama's likely NBA home is decided as Spurs win No. 1 pick, with man labeled an 'alien' by LeBron James eyeing 'a ring ASAP' and warning league: 'Be ready'

San Antonio had the joint-best odds - 14 percent - of getting the No. 1 pick, and now they'll have the chance of selecting a generational prospect once dubbed an 'alien' by LeBron James.

NBA draft lottery 2023 guide: Where can I watch? Where will Victor Wembanyama go? Who will get the No. 1 pick? What chance does each team have?

The NBA season may not yet be finished but the Association's worst franchises will have their futures changed Tuesday night. 14 teams will have an opportunity to land the No. 1 overall pick.

7-foot-4 Victor Wembanyama will learn his NBA team at the Draft Lottery on Tuesday... so where will the superstar-in-waiting end up? Gregg Popovich's Spurs? LaMelo Ball's Hornets? Houston?

A 7-foot-4 basketball sensation poised to replace wine as France's top export, Victor Wembanyama is the biggest NBA Draft Lottery prize in more than a decade.

Former Texas star guard and Phoenix Suns GM Lance Blanks dies age 56 in Dallas as widespread tributes across the NBA mourn a 'devastating' loss

Former Texas star guard Lance Blanks, who also served as general manager of the Phoenix Suns, has died. He was 56.

Pistons assistant GM Rob Murphy is fired over sexual assault and harassment claims made by his ex-assistant: Accuser sues team, saying he groped her in front of her daughter, 4, and tried to force her to have sex

The Detroit Pistons have fired assistant general manager Rob Murphy for an alleged violation of the team workplace conduct policy involving his female executive assistant.

Pittsburgh legend Dick Groat dies at 92: Pirates and Duke icon leaves behind one of the most accomplished legacies in American Sports history

The native of Wilkinsburg, Pennsylvania, was a two-time World Series champ' with the Pirates and St. Louis Cardinals. He was also the first basketball player to ever have his No. retired by Duke.

Pistons 'get permission to interview Bucks assistant Charles Lee to replace outgoing head coach Dwane Casey' as team begins rebuilding effort around rookies Jaden Ivey and Jalen Duren

The Bucks have given the Pistons permission to interview Milwaukee assistant Charles Lee for Detroit's head-coaching vacancy, according to ESPN.

Ime Udoka 'is a candidate for TWO NBA head coaching jobs' after affair with Celtics staffer cost him his job in Boston... as Pistons and Rockets eye him for vacancies

Former Celtics head coach Ime Udoka is reportedly in the running for two new job vacancies. Udoka was given a year-long suspension after an improper relationship with a Boston staffer.

Dwane Casey steps down as Detroit Pistons head coach and will take a front office role as season ends with the NBA's worst record at 17-65

Detroit Pistons coach Dwane Casey stepped down after Sunday´s 103-81 loss to the Chicago Bulls to end the 2022-23 season.

NBA ROUNDUP: Mavericks officially eliminated from the playoffs with loss to Bulls as the Grizzlies lock up the second seed in the West

Coby White scored 24 points and the short-handed Chicago Bulls rallied past the depleted Mavericks 115-112 on Friday night, eliminating Dallas from play-in contention.

Ex-NBA player and college basketball legend Eric Montross diagnosed with cancer at age of 51: Tributes pour in for North Carolina legend

Eric Montross, a former national champion with North Carolina and first-round NBA draft pick, has been diagnosed with cancer, the Montross family announced Saturday ...

NBA ROUNDUP: Grizzlies put together offensive masterpiece as they score 151 against Rockets to clinch a playoff berth, while Dennis Smith Jr. hits game-winning buzzer beater against his old team to lift Hornets to SHOCK win over Mavericks

Luke Kennard made a franchise-record 10 3-pointers to match his career high with 30 points, Desmond Bane added 25 points and the Memphis Grizzlies clinched a playoff spot ...

NBA ROUNDUP: Miami Heat just keeps the playoffs in sight thanks to Tyler Herro's explosion in win over Detroit Pistons, while the Nuggets edge out the Nets in narrow 105-102 victory

Miami improved to 39-34, one game behind the Brooklyn Nets for the sixth seed in the Eastern Conference. 'This is going to be our March Madness and April Madness,' Heat coach Erik Spoelstra said.

LaMelo Ball 'will miss the rest of the NBA season' for the lowly Charlotte Hornets after the one-time All-Star suffered a fractured ankle during Monday's win vs. Detroit

Charlotte Hornets star LaMelo Ball 'will miss the remainder of the NBA season' after sustaining a fractured right ankle in Monday night's 117-106 win over the Detroit Pistons.

Charlotte Hornets guard LaMelo Ball suffers FRACTURE in his ankle after turning it in win over the Detroit Pistons... after spraining his other ankle three times this season

He headed to the team's locker room, and the Hornets announced postgame that an X-ray found the fracture. Ball had 18 points, six rebounds, and five assists prior to exiting.

NBA ROUNDUP: Late Jayson Tatum 3-pointer leads Celtics over 76ers, Ja Morant helps Grizzlies over Nuggets, and Knicks win their fifth in a row - downing the Pelicans

Jayson Tatum hit a game-winning 3-pointer with 1.3 seconds remaining to lift the Boston Celtics past the host Philadelphia 76ers 110-107 on Saturday.

Golden State Warriors have until Sunday evening to decide if they want to go ahead with Gary Payton II four-team trade after Portland player failed his physical

Payton's injury could sideline him for the much of the remainder of the regular season, and Golden State now has until Sunday evening to determine if it wants to proceed with the deal.

NBA ROUNDUP: Kyrie Irving stars for Dallas in his second game as they defeat Sacramento, Donovan Mitchell dominates the Pelicans and Jayson Tatum bests LaMelo Ball as Boston continue to lead the way in the East

Kyrie Irving had 25 points and 10 assists as the Dallas Mavericks beat the Sacramento Kings 122-114 on Friday night for their third straight win with Luka Doncic set to return Saturday.

Not so fast! Huge four-team trade between the Warriors, Pistons, Hawks, and Trail Blazers 'could be de-railed due to concerns over Gary Payton II's health'

One of the more convoluted deals from the NBA's trade deadline could all come crashing down over the health of one player.

NBA TRADE DEADLINE RECAP: See how all the action unfolded on a crazy day of deals - with Gary Payton II, Russell Westbrook and Kevin Durant all on the move in final 24 hours

Scroll down to see how all the madness unfolded on a crazy final day of the NBA Trade Deadline. In the final hours, the likes of Kevin Durant, Gary Payton II and Russell Westbrook were all on the move...

NBA ROUND-UP: Nets seal dramatic comeback win WITHOUT Kyrie Irving as Cam Thomas scores a career-high 44 points, while the Thunder record a team-record 153 in victory over the Rockets

Cam Thomas scored a career-high 44 points off the bench and the short-handed Brooklyn Nets rallied from a 23-point deficit to stun the Washington Wizards 125-123 on Saturday night.

Lakers and Jazz 'explore potential Russell Westbrook trade' amid rumors LA wants to reunite Kyrie Irving with LeBron James ahead of playoffs

Westbrook, 34, is averaging 15.7 points, 6.3 rebounds and 7.6 assists over 28.8 minutes per game off the bench as the Lakers' sixth man. The Lakers are communicating with most NBA teams.

NBA ROUND-UP: Jayson Tatum is held to a WOEFUL 3-15 shooting night as the Celtics lose to the Suns, while the Sixers keep up their winning ways as they take down the Spurs

Mikal Bridges scored 25 points and Dario Saric had 14 with 13 rebounds Friday night to lead the Phoenix Suns to a 106-94 victory over Boston and send the Celtics to their fourth loss in six games.

NBA ROUNDUP: Fired-up Luka Doncic scores 53 in victory after 'chirpy' Pistons assistant tells him to 'play basketball', while Russell Westbrook passes Gary Payton for 10th place all-time on NBA assists list but Lakers fall to defeat at the Nets

Luka Doncic had 53 points in his return to the lineup and Spencer Dinwiddie scored 10 of his 12 in the fourth quarter as the Dallas Mavericks rallied to beat the Detroit Pistons 111-105 on Monday night.

NBA ROUND-UP: Milwaukee Bucks score 150 in rout over the Pistons on Giannis Antetokounmpo's return, as the Magic end the NBA-leading Celtics' nine-game winning streak

Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 20 of his 29 points in the first quarter, returning to the lineup after a five-game absence to lead the Milwaukee Bucks in a 150-130 win over the Detroit Pistons.

Aurelien Tchouameni issues grovelling APOLOGY to Real Madrid fans on Twitter after Los Blancos supporters were left seething by his appearance at an NBA match in Paris while his side laboured to a 3-2 win over Villarreal

The Los Blancos midfielder took to Twitter to issue his grovelling apology, in which he admitted he had not 'done the right thing' to the club's supporters.

Bleu, Blanc et Bulls! Chicago extends its dominance over the Detroit Pistons to two continents as Zach LaVine and Co run riot to a 126-108 victory in Paris during the NBA's first game in Europe since 2020

It was the first NBA game in Europe since 2020 and Zach LaVine and Co. did not disappoint the stars and fans in attendance as the Bulls defeated their Central Division rival for the 13th consecutive time.

Projected No 1 draft pick Victor Wembanyama is the star of the show at NBA Paris as he watches Pistons-Bulls match-up courtside... with model Naomi Campbell, Pharrell Williams, Lakers legend Magic Johnson and F1 star Charles Leclerc also in attendance

Victor Wembanyama is the unanimous projection to go No 1 in the 2023 draft and he got an early look at the Detroit Pistons, one of the teams set to have some of the best lottery odds to land him.

Detroit Pistons star Killian Hayes is relishing being back on home soil in France - as point guard looks to inspire his side to victory against the Chicago Bulls 'and make more memories' in the 2023 NBA Paris Game

The Detroit Pistons and the Chicago Bulls will meet in the unfamiliar setting of Paris on Thursday night, but for Killian Hayes it is home sweet home.

Jalen Duren FINALLY joins his Pistons teammates in Paris one day out from their showdown with the Bulls after the Rookie center 'lost his passport and was stuck in the US' ahead of 2023 NBA Europe game

Duren was a notable absentee in a photo taken of Detroit's squad in front of the Eiffel Tower earlier this week, and reports soon emerged that he was stuck in the US after losing his passport.
